snippet: With the support of a former math teacher and the Community Service Society, Lidio Rodriguez gained the training he needed to work in information technology.
abstract: Community Service Society, one of the seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, secures $224 for Lidio Rodriguez to pay for two monthly MetroCards to continue his training for work in information technology in the Bronx.
lead_paragraph: With the support of a former math teacher and the Community Service Society, Lidio Rodriguez gained the training he needed to work in information technology.

headline.main: After Seeking Help, a Student Finds a Path to a Job
headline.print_headline: After Seeking Help, a Student Finds a Path to a Job
